description:
Join us at Cookpad HQ in Bristol this month to hear from Christian Bruckmayer, whose talk features at this year's RubyConf Indonesia and RubyConf Nashville.

Expect another Ruby packed evening with plenty of conversation, beers and bites to eat.

Schedule

18:30 - 19:00 - Arrive, grab a drink, some delicious locally supplied food and have a chat with fellow attendees

19:00 - "Digesting MRI by Studying Alternative Ruby Implementations” by Christian Bruckmayer. "If you ever wanted to learn about Ruby internals without being a C expert, this talk is for you."

Slack

If you'd like to join us on Slack please join https://bathruby-for-slackers.herokuapp.com and find us in the #south-west-ruby channel

Notices

Please let us know in the comments of the event if you have any specific food allergies, dietary or access requirements so we can be sure to best accommodate everyone!
title: South West Ruby #21
